version_description:
As we welcome you to the family, we've made some enhancements so that you come onboard smoothly. You also won't get logged out if you'd like look at your app screen for a longer duration! If you're lucky, you might catch your returns increasing.

Your rainy day funds are more important now, more than ever, so the process to withdraw your money is made smoother. Some changes that are pleasing to the eye include a text alignment change & a fixed typo error (no prizes given if you can tell the difference!). Lastly, we've done the usual bug extermination. Say hello to a cleaner Singlife App!

As we welcome you to the family, we've made some enhancements so that you come onboard smoothly. You also won't get logged out if you'd like look at your app screen for a longer duration! If you're lucky, you might catch your returns increasing.

Your rainy day funds are more important now, more than ever, so the process to withdraw your money is made smoother. Some changes that are pleasing to the eye include a text alignment change & a fixed typo error (no prizes given if you can tell the difference!). Lastly, we've done the usual bug extermination. Say hello to a cleaner Singlife App!

In this release, the app will be functioning at a faster speed, plus we've also optimised the ordering flow for your Singlife Card - go grease lightning! Get ready to access your hard earned funds :muscle: (Oh, and did we mention that you can enjoy no FX fees on your overseas transactions, including your online purchases?)
Security is key here at Singlife so we've enhanced our encryption measures to make our app much more secure. For a mini visual delight, check out the activity list on your home screen & spot the difference! Several improvements were also made to our on-boarding flow.
Finally, introduce your friends to Singlife Account by sharing a download link from the app (be sure they're on their mobile devices). Keep your eyes peeled for something exciting rolling out :eyes:

In this release, the app will be functioning at a faster speed, plus we've also optimised the ordering flow for your Singlife Card - go grease lightning! Get ready to access your hard earned funds :muscle: (Oh, and did we mention that you can enjoy no FX fees on your overseas transactions, including your online purchases?)
Security is key here at Singlife so we've enhanced our encryption measures to make our app much more secure. For a mini visual delight, check out the activity list on your home screen & spot the difference! Several improvements were also made to our on-boarding flow.
Finally, introduce your friends to Singlife Account by sharing a download link from the app (be sure they're on their mobile devices). Keep your eyes peeled for something exciting rolling out :eyes:

Need guidance on your finances or how to achieve your financial milestones? In this release, we're excited to share that you can now get free advice when you connect to one of our trusted third-party financial advisers.
You can now update your bank account details for fund withdrawal purposes at your own convenience. Simply head on over to the app to delete & add a new one in! Easy breezy.
Also, don't you hate it when your passwords don't match? We've added a 'show password' feature where new members of the Singlife Account family can ensure that their passwords match. We've also enhanced certain processes in the on-boarding as well as card ordering flows to make things seamless for you.
We're always sad to see you go but we're here to make sure that your funds safely reach you. Hence, we've now enhanced some processes for if you ever need to terminate your Singlife Account.
Apart from the usual spring cleaning of bugs, we've once again optimised the performance of the app & now it works faster for you! A certain UI improvement has been made, feel free to let us know if you are able to spot the difference!

Need guidance on your finances or how to achieve your financial milestones? In this release, we're excited to share that you can now get free advice when you connect to one of our trusted third-party financial advisers.
You can now update your bank account details for fund withdrawal purposes at your own convenience. Simply head on over to the app to delete & add a new one in! Easy breezy.
Also, don't you hate it when your passwords don't match? We've added a 'show password' feature where new members of the Singlife Account family can ensure that their passwords match. We've also enhanced certain processes in the on-boarding as well as card ordering flows to make things seamless for you.
We're always sad to see you go but we're here to make sure that your funds safely reach you. Hence, we've now enhanced some processes for if you ever need to terminate your Singlife Account.
Apart from the usual spring cleaning of bugs, we've once again optimised the performance of the app & now it works faster for you! A certain UI improvement has been made, feel free to let us know if you are able to spot the difference!

Besides the standard fixes, in this release, the top 3 things you can look forward to are:

1. A faster onboarding process – to the delight of our many new customers
2. Our app font is now standardised across device types. Visual consistency!
3. For the people who've gleefully participated in our not-so-secret paid referral programme, good news! You can now see the names of those who you've invited or have invited you in your transaction screen

Besides the standard fixes, in this release, the top 3 things you can look forward to are:

1. A faster onboarding process – to the delight of our many new customers
2. Our app font is now standardised across device types. Visual consistency!
3. For the people who've gleefully participated in our not-so-secret paid referral programme, good news! You can now see the names of those who you've invited or have invited you in your transaction screen

Besides improving overall app stability (app store reviewers- we are listening and working on it!), we will be releasing:
1. FAQs within the app - this means you no longer need to talk to Vincent from our support team to get (all) the answers, you can now self-serve by clicking on the question mark on the top right hand corner of the screen.
2. Your transactions list and withdrawal flow have gotten a makeover too.

Besides improving overall app stability (app store reviewers- we are listening and working on it!), we will be releasing:
1. FAQs within the app - this means you no longer need to talk to Vincent from our support team to get (all) the answers, you can now self-serve by clicking on the question mark on the top right hand corner of the screen.
2. Your transactions list and withdrawal flow have gotten a makeover too.

Today's small release includes:

• Our 'Show More' button in app is fixed! You can now view your complete activity history.
• Several blank screens- occurring rarely and randomly, we've now exterminated that bug. Other screen errors might inevitably occur, but we will hunt them down and eliminate them, too.
• Unable to confirm full name- some customers were unable to complete their full names and sign up. We've fixed that, too.

Today's small release includes:

• Our 'Show More' button in app is fixed! You can now view your complete activity history.
• Several blank screens- occurring rarely and randomly, we've now exterminated that bug. Other screen errors might inevitably occur, but we will hunt them down and eliminate them, too.
• Unable to confirm full name- some customers were unable to complete their full names and sign up. We've fixed that, too.

Our app is turning a big 4.0.
As such- it's presents for everyone!
In v4.0, you will see the following:
1. Still unsure when your return will be credited? We now have a returns dashboard to let users know just that.
2. We know incentives are important to you. So we've unlocked the feature of "bonus return" in-app! Go check out our card spend campaign screens.
3. And...We've also squashed more bugs (clearly ageing like fine wine).

Our app is turning a big 4.0.
As such- it's presents for everyone!
In v4.0, you will see the following:
1. Still unsure when your return will be credited? We now have a returns dashboard to let users know just that.
2. We know incentives are important to you. So we've unlocked the feature of "bonus return" in-app! Go check out our card spend campaign screens.
3. And...We've also squashed more bugs (clearly ageing like fine wine).
Yikes! We've discovered an annoying bug which made the app lock screen all loopy for some of our iOS users using their biometric Face ID. We're stamping it out with v4.1.1. Good riddance!
Yikes! We've discovered an annoying bug which made the app lock screen all loopy for some of our iOS users using their biometric Face ID. We're stamping it out with v4.1.1. Good riddance!

Besides the usual (bug) demolition work, this minor release contains:
1. The bar tracking your card spend was misaligned, we've fixed it in this release
2. It is now much easier to switch your Grow portfolio
3. Loading times for when you make transactions are now shortened

Besides the usual (bug) demolition work, this minor release contains:
1. The bar tracking your card spend was misaligned, we've fixed it in this release
2. It is now much easier to switch your Grow portfolio
3. Loading times for when you make transactions are now shortened

In v4.3:
1. Just in time for Xmas-our new investment vertical, Grow, is available to everyone! Explore our new Grow service in the "Portfolios" tab.
2. For those who want to buy insurance on app, our term life insurance, MFLI, can now be paid via credit card
3. Singlife Account is now officially *sobs* on waitlist (It's not you, it's us, really!)
4. Beefed-up our security to fend off intruders- you never know what they have up their sleeves this Xmas (remember Home Alone 1, 2, 3, 4?)

In v4.3:
1. Just in time for Xmas-our new investment vertical, Grow, is available to everyone! Explore our new Grow service in the "Portfolios" tab.
2. For those who want to buy insurance on app, our term life insurance, MFLI, can now be paid via credit card
3. Singlife Account is now officially *sobs* on waitlist (It's not you, it's us, really!)
4. Beefed-up our security to fend off intruders- you never know what they have up their sleeves this Xmas (remember Home Alone 1, 2, 3, 4?)

Happy 2021!

We're hoping those vaccines work, but in the meantime, here are the other things which have taken flight in v4.4.0:

1. New Year, New You, New Me, New Us! Find your personal details under the Singlife ID tab in a refreshing new display! Your communication preferences and security settings can also be toggled in the same tab.
2. Patched up bugs in transaction history and biometrics.
3. Back-end enhancements for a better app experience.

Happy 2021!

We're hoping those vaccines work, but in the meantime, here are the other things which have taken flight in v4.4.0:

1. New Year, New You, New Me, New Us! Find your personal details under the Singlife ID tab in a refreshing new display! Your communication preferences and security settings can also be toggled in the same tab.
2. Patched up bugs in transaction history and biometrics.
3. Back-end enhancements for a better app experience.

Oolala! Some zesty love is in the air this weekend. Here's some from us to you Romeos and Juliets.

1. My First Life Insurance is now open to all! Explore your first under the Policies tab
2. Already protected? You can now view your policy statuses and coverage in the Policies dashboard
3. Grow-ers can now grow more with multiple concurrent top-ups. More stonks!
4. Bug fixes on transaction details for FX and MCC categories
5. Enhanced back-end flows for a smoother ride

Oolala! Some zesty love is in the air this weekend. Here's some from us to you Romeos and Juliets.

1. My First Life Insurance is now open to all! Explore your first under the Policies tab
2. Already protected? You can now view your policy statuses and coverage in the Policies dashboard
3. Grow-ers can now grow more with multiple concurrent top-ups. More stonks!
4. Bug fixes on transaction details for FX and MCC categories
5. Enhanced back-end flows for a smoother ride

v4.6.1 is here- minor release, maximum impact.

1. You can now withdraw your Grow dollars direct to your Singlife Account, EZPZ
2. Lazy to fill in your withdrawal OTP? No problem, we now provide autofill suggestions!
3. We've added a confirmation screen for successful Grow applications so you know you good
4. Done up some minor copy text changes in Grow
5. Optimized APIs for a slicker ride in Grow and MFLI
6. Refreshed In-app FAQs. Knowledge is power!

v4.6.1 is here- minor release, maximum impact.

1. You can now withdraw your Grow dollars direct to your Singlife Account, EZPZ
2. Lazy to fill in your withdrawal OTP? No problem, we now provide autofill suggestions!
3. We've added a confirmation screen for successful Grow applications so you know you good
4. Done up some minor copy text changes in Grow
5. Optimized APIs for a slicker ride in Grow and MFLI
6. Refreshed In-app FAQs. Knowledge is power!

While some of us wait on our vaccines, we at Singlife have also immunised against some (other) bugs in v4.7:

1. Improved app monitoring and security
2. Worked at these things called APIs so the app can go faster
3. Fixed an old bug, where more than one in-flight request for an adviser can be made. As Dumbledore says, help will always be given to those who ask for it (in-app).
4. Finally, once you've setup your initial GIRO account, you can use it as the default for your other Grow policies!

While some of us wait on our vaccines, we at Singlife have also immunised against some (other) bugs in v4.7:

1. Improved app monitoring and security
2. Worked at these things called APIs so the app can go faster
3. Fixed an old bug, where more than one in-flight request for an adviser can be made. As Dumbledore says, help will always be given to those who ask for it (in-app).
4. Finally, once you've setup your initial GIRO account, you can use it as the default for your other Grow policies!

April is here, and so is v4.8. The weather might have been hot and cold so far, but rest assured, we're always steady when it comes to you ;)

1. Fixed an issue where app crashes when MFLI payment is made with SA and a few other bugs
2. Tweaked MFLI and Grow to make it slicker
3. Upgraded in-app software to remain on top of our game

April is here, and so is v4.8. The weather might have been hot and cold so far, but rest assured, we're always steady when it comes to you ;)

1. Fixed an issue where app crashes when MFLI payment is made with SA and a few other bugs
2. Tweaked MFLI and Grow to make it slicker
3. Upgraded in-app software to remain on top of our game

It’s almost Labour Day! We’ve been working hard so that you don’t have to :D

1. Automate your regular Grow top-ups via SA or iDDA (yay!)
2. Amex cardholders rejoice! Fund your FIRST Grow policy with your Amex card to get ’dem perks
3. Your portfolio names can now be seen on your Grow dashboard
4. Be notified of when your CKA status is expiring so you can keep creating new Grow portfolios!
5. Enhanced security features and bug fixes

Here's v4.10:
1. Transaction history can now be viewed monthly for easier tracking of your shopping decisions ;)
2. Tired of keying in your password and OTP everytime you open the app? We'll now help you set-up your pin and biometrics for easier access!
3. Minor bug fix on card activation
